article_text:
Faith Technologies would occupy the upper seven floors of an eight-story office tower in downtown Menasha, shown here in an illustration provided by developers. (Photo: Submitted)

Menasha has a lot going on these days — a new tower, a revamped high school and a Boys & Girls Club, to name a few.

It's a community that is undergoing a tremendous amount of change.

What would you like to see for Menasha's future? What does the city still need to make it even better? Share your thoughts and we'll publish them in Sunday's Valley Voices section.

Head to our Facebook page at facebook.com/postcrescent and tell us your thoughts at 7 p.m. Wednesday. Tweet us @PostCrescent. Email us a traditional letter to the editor to pcletters@postcrescent.com, and be sure to include your full name, hometown and phone number. Or drop one off at our office at 306 W. Washington St. in Appleton. We'll publish them on Sunday.

Please get it to us before 10 a.m. Friday to be considered.

Read or Share this story: http://post.cr/1MxoiX0

article_metadata.description: What's in store for Menasha? Tell us what you think!
